籰字的基本解释

籰
yuè
古同“篗”。

籰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》王縛切，入藥，云。］
亦作“篗1”。
络丝、纱、线等的工具。

籰字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籰； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页906第15
【廣韻】【集韻】王縛切【韻會】越縛切【正韻】烏郭切，?音貜。絡絲具。本作篗。今作籰。又作䈅。　又【類篇】越逼切。竹叢生。

籰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
籰字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" Wang Fu cut, used in medicine, cloud. ]
Also known as "篗1".
Tools for winding silk, yarn, thread, etc.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　籰; Kangxi Strokes: 26; Page Number: Page 906 No. 15
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Wang Fuqie [Yunhui] Yue Fuqie [Zheng Yun] Wu Guoqie,? Yin 貜. Winding with wire. This is a sack. This is a 籰. Make another qi.　[Classes] are getting more and more pressing. Bamboo grows thickly.
